meanings.sent1: The elephant is the massiest animal in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The sun is the massiest object in our solar system.
meanings.sent3: The massiest cake at the party was too heavy to carry!
meanings.sent4: Her backpack felt like the massiest burden on her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The massiest rock in the quarry was impossible to lift.

meanings.sent1: The massiest of all the stars in the galaxy is the black hole.
meanings.sent2: The moon is considered the massiest of all the natural satellites.
meanings.sent3: The massiest of the clouds seemed to be carrying all the rain.
meanings.sent4: The massiest of the buildings in the city stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: The massiest of the ships in the harbor was a sight to behold.
